Digital Filtering

Files

file  filter.h
 

digital filter functions


Defines

#define FILTER_IN_BUF_POW   11
 size (number of 16Bit values) of the input-buffer as a power to 2
#define FILTER_IN_BUF_MASK   (1<<FILTER_IN_BUF_POW)
 size (number of 16Bit values) of input-buffer in bytes
#define FILTER_ORD   333
 order of the digital filter
#define DEC_RATIO   5
 decimation Ratio (1 for DEC_RATIO)

Enumerations

enum  decimState_t { ON = 1, OFF = 0 }
 

enumeration type for the decimation steering

More...

Functions

void filterInit ()
 initialises the digital filter
int16_t filterIdentity ()
 a simple filter that routes the input directly to the output
uint16_t filterFIR ()
 filters values using a FIR-filter
uint16_t filterFIRDecim ()
 filters values using a FIR-filter and decimates them (1 from 5)
uint8_t filterWrite2Buf (int16_t val)
 writes a value into the input buffer
uint16_t filterWaitingVals ()
 returns the number of values that still need to be processed
void filterReset ()
 resets the filter by clearing its input buffer

Variables

decimState_t decimation
 switch to turn decimation on or off

Detailed Description

This module provides functions to digitally filter data
